post:
Hello LET community! 

Deals are back at OVHcloud until February 2nd or while stocks last, which ever comes first!
To abid by the LET rules, only Dedicated Server offers under US$84/month recurring with no setup fees are mentioned with a price below: 

![](https://i.imgur.com/ntlk0Aw.png "")

For those  who might be familiar with our best-seller dedicated server in Asia-pacific (DO-32-APAC), it is now re-born as RISE-APAC with a lower price tag on long term plan and twice more data transfer per month included!

Explore offers: 

*     Asia (billing in US$): https://www.ovh.com/asia/deals/
*     Australia (billing in A$): https://www.ovh.com.au/deals/
*     Singapore (billing in S$): https://www.ovh.com/sg/deals/
*     Rest of the world (US$): https://www.ovh.com/world/deals/

or be redirected to your local OVH website, simply visit https://www.ovhcloud.com
